Posted By: Bruce Dorskind

An important client of our Group has a long-standing
interest in mid-grade Mecca T 201's.

On his behalf, we have been asked to assist in helping said
client complete his T 201 collection.

We will pay competitively for the following cards.

PSA 6 preferred.  PSA 5 acceptable.

Please write privately.  Can pay via pay pal or check



Cards Needs



E.Cicotte/Thoney
Bresnhan / Huggins 
Egardner/Speaker
JLake/Wallace


Thank you in advance for your attention to this matter

Bruce Dorskind
bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com
